name: The Forbidden Overlord of Yore
text:
Can be used before your normal draw each time your Life Points decrease by 1000. One of the cards from your normal draw this turn will be a random "Forbidden One" monster or "Exodia" card from your Deck.
Also, apply the following effects for each specified normal draw for three turns (activated from your turn 1).
1st turn: Add 1 "Right Leg of the Forbidden One" and 1 "Left Leg of the Forbidden One" from outside of your Deck to the bottom of your Deck.
2nd turn: Add 1 "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and 1 "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" from outside of your Deck to the bottom of your Deck.
3rd turn: Add 1 "Exodia the Forbidden One" from outside of your Deck to the bottom of your Deck.
